alert.note: Alert for Christian; Muhlenberg; Todd (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Muhlenberg, northern Christian and Todd Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 308 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crofton to 6 miles northwest of Elkton to 6 miles northeast of Guthrie. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Elkton around 315 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Dunmor and Weir. This includes Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 7 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
